items.content_html: This application streamlines the management of exhibits in a science museum. The frontend is built using React and Tauri, providing a responsive and lightweight user interface. The backend server and database are developed with Rocket and Rustqlite in Rust, ensuring robust performance and reliability.
items.title: ljt019/exhibit_manager: This application streamlines the management of exhibits in a science museum. The frontend is built using React and Tauri, providing a responsive and lightweight user interface. The backend server and database are developed with Rocket and Rustqlite in Rust, ensuring robust performance and reliability.

items.content_html: Easy-to-use and lightweight library for caching and serving static resources locally, drastically reducing bandwidth usage and greatly improving load speeds. Especially useful for larger websites or for mobile/PWA apps that need have offline capabilities.

items.content_html: PinItPro is a lightweight desktop app that reinvents the sticky note experience. This project is built using Electron, a framework for building cross-platform desktop applications with web technologies.

items.content_html: A lightweight wrapper over fetch with zero race conditions by default, and everything one could yearn for in a fetching library like timeouts, retries, interceptors and so much more
